subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Danny Lee, the world’s top-ranked amateur at 18, cruised past both of his opponents in match play and moved within three wins of supplanting Tiger Woods as the youngest champion in United States Amateur history. He dominated the Clemson freshman Jacob Burger, 5 and 4, in the second round, then defeated Wichita State’s Connor McHenry, 7 and 6, in the Round of 16.
